title: ‘Straight Line Crazy’ Review: The Road Rage of Robert Moses
description: Off Broadway at the Shed, Ralph Fiennes is glorious in David Hare’s sputtering portrait of the man who paved New York.
dc:creator: Jesse Green

media:content.media:description: Ralph Fiennes as the notorious urban planner Robert Moses in David Hare’s play “Straight Line Crazy” at the Shed in Manhattan.
